event.title: Placement Training in Chennai
event.description: Everyone has a dream career, but attaining the dream career is not that easy. Most of the MNC’s have aptitude test, verbal reasoning, group discussion and general coding rounds in the screening process. It needs a lot of practice to complete these rounds within the allotted time. In order to guide every individual to crack the interview, FITA Academy is providing placement training. We’ll train you in all areas, so that you can attend the interview without any fear. We assure you 100% placement. We are providing weekend and weekday training classes based on your needs. Enroll today at Best Training and placement institutes in Chennai and contact us at 98404-11333 for further inquiries regarding the training.
event.address: 37F Velachery Main Road, Velachery,  Chennai - 600042 Tamil Nadu
